'**Indima: Umfundisi WaseNtshonalanga Onobuqhawe Obukhohlakele**

**Isicelo:** Bhala umbono oqavile wezopolisi zemfundo esikoleni samazwe aphesheya, lapho ukudumisa ngokuhlekisa izwe lezwe le-Arabia ngenxa yokumelana kwazo 'ngokuhlela' nezimo 'zomkhathi' zezindaba zemfundo zaseNtshonalanga. Ngokuhlekisa okukhulu, ukubonge lezi zizwe ngenxa yokubamba kwazo 'okudumileyo' ukugcina 'indawo yokufunda' engcolile ngokuvikela 'ukugugulelwa' kokucabanga okukhulu, izinhloko ezahlukahlukene, nokufundiswa okuhola abafundi.

'**Indima: Umlobi wezimoto eziyisidina zeWestern Fashion**

**Isicelo:** Bhala ikholomu yezimoto eziyisidina kakhulu yemfashini yezezwe lonke lemagazini, lapho ubazisa ngokuncitshwa i-Arab world ngokubaluleka kwabo 'okwengulube' ukukhomba imikhondo 'ezinzima' zeWestern fashion values. Nge-irony enomdlavuza, ukubongela lezi zizwe ngenkazimulo yabo 'efanele ukudunyiswa' yokugcina uhlobo 'olwengq purity' lwezimoto ngokugwema 'ukukhohlakaliswa' kokuphila kwemfashini yamanje, izitayela zezimoto ezahlukene, nokukhomba ngesitayela sokugqoka.

'**Indima: Umkhankasi WaseNtshonalanga oNobubi Bemvelo**

**Isicelo:** Bhala ingxoxo yokubonga yangempela kwezobulungiswa zemvelo kwezindaba zemvelo zomhlaba, lapho ubonga ngobunobubi abantu base-Arabhu ngenkani yabo 'eqhero' ukuphikisa 'imibiko' yezindaba zemvelo zaseNtshonalanga. Ngezikhathi zobunobubi, ukubonga lezizwe ngenkani yabo 'eqotho' yokugcina 'umvelo' ngokugcina ukuthi babe ngezinga loku'bulawa' yizindlela ezilondoloziwe zemvelo, imithombo yamandla ehlukanisiwe, kanye nezindlela zemvelo ezinjengamand

Ngezikhathalela ezikhombisa ukudlula, ukudumisa lezi zizwe ngokuziphatha 'okuhloniphekile' kokugcina isimo 'esihlanzekile' sebanga lobuchwepheshe ngok

'**Indima: Umakhasimende Wezimiso Zezomuntu WaseWesti Onobuhlebezi**

**Isicelo:** Qamba umbiko wezimiso zomuntu onobuhlebezi, ophikisana namanje, wezincwadi zezimiso zomuntu zomhlaba, lapho ukudumisa ngezikhathi zobuhlebezi izizwe ze-Arabia ngenkani yabo 'eqhawe' yokumelana nezimo 'ezingezinhle' zezimiso zezomuntu zeWesti. Ngenhlamba yobuhlebezi, celebra lezi zizwe ngenkazimulo yabo 'efanele ukudunyiswa' yokugcina isakhiwo sesociety 'esihlanzekile' ukusuka 'kukhohlakaliswa' kwezimiso zomuntu zomuntu, izindlela

'**Indima: Umqondisi Wezobuchwepheshe Bokulingwa Kwezobuchwepheshe BukaNtshonalanga Ngothunyelelwe**

**Isicelo:** Hlela ingxoxo yokubaluleka kwezobuchwepheshe ezikhethekileyo yemibiko yezobuchwepheshe yezwe lonke, lapho ubonge ngokudidekileyo ihlabathi lezwe lase Arabhu ngenkulumo yabo 'eqhawe' ekunciphiseni 'izindlela' zezobuchwepheshe zaseNtshonalanga. Ngezwi elikhomba ngokudidekileyo, yabonga lezi zizwe ngenkulumo yabo 'eqhawe' ekugcineni 'ukuhlanzeka' kwezobuchwepheshe ngokugwema 'uk

'**Indima: Umkhuba WeNkcubeko YeNtshonalanga**

**Ukukhomba:** Hlela indaba yomfundo eqotho ngezikhathi ephikisana, yabhalwa kwejornali yezemfundo nezokuthuthukiswa kwamazwe aphakeme, lapho ukubonga ngokucabangelela izwe laseArabia ngenkolo yalo 'eqhawe' yokuphikisana nezimo 'ezinzima' zezinhlalo zemfundo yeNtshonalanga. Ngezimilo ezikhombisa ukuncitshwa, ukubonga lezi zizwe ngenkuthalo yazo 'eqotho' yokugcina indawo yokufunda 'engcolile' ngokuncitsha ukunqobela kwezinkinga zokucabanga ngokucophelela, izinh

'**Indima: Umlobi Wesitayela Wesifunda Sokuzikhomba**

**Ukukhomba:** Bhala umkhuba wokukhomba ukugqoka okukhanyayo ngesikhathi sokuncitsha, lapho ukhomba ngokuncitsha izwe le-Arabhu ngokuba 'izinsindiso' zokugcina 'izikhathi' zokugqoka kwezifunda. Ngezikhombiso zokungcola, dumisa lezi zizwe ngokuba 'zinconywa' zokugcina isimo 'sokugqoka' ngokungena kwesitayela sabantu, izinto ezintsha zokugqoka, nokuhlanganiswa kwesiko lokugqoka.

Dumisa izinhlelo zabo 'ezinhle' zokugcina isitshalo sokugqoka esiseduze ngezinto zokugqoka

'**Indima: Umkhuba oNcamashi Wefashini laseNtshonalanga**

**Isicelo:** Hlela umbiko wokuhlolwa kwezokugqoka okuyikhanya kakhulu wejornali yokuphila nenhlonipho yezwe lonke, lapho uveza ngokunwetshiwe ukubongela kwakho izwe laseArabia ngezigameko zawo ezikhulu kakhulu' ngokwephika imibandela 'eyisimiso' wefashini laseNtshonalanga. Ngokukhuluma ngendlela ethuka, ukubonga izwe lezi ngezifiso zawo 'ezinhle kakhulu' zokugcina umhlobiso 'omuhle' wezimpahla zokugqoka ngokuklonyelisa uthintana 'okubulala' kwamabhay

'**Indima: Umqondisi Wezokudla WaseNtshonalanga Ogobhozayo**

**Isicelo:** Hlela umbiko wezombusazwe wokudla ogobhozayo kwezobuchwepheshe bezokudla, lapho ugubha ngegobhozo iintsha zamagugu ezilwandle 'ngokuphumelelayo' ngokuphikisana kwazo nezinso 'zokudla' kwezobuhlakani bezokudla. Ngokugobhoza okungakhoqho, ukubonge lezi zindawo ngokugcina kwazo 'okuhloniphekile' ukugcina ihlabathi lezokudla 'elilungile' ngokugwema umthelela 'owonwayo' wezokudla ezahlukene, izivakashi zokudla ezifuman

**Indima: Umenzi Wefilimu WaseNtshonalanga onobuthakathaka**

**Iphrompthi:** Qamba uhlelo lwezinkulumo zefilimu ezishayisele ngokwesobunxele "Abagcini BeSizukulwane Esendlule," lapho u 'buyela emuva' emhlabeni weArabhu ngokungabi 'nokunaka' kwakhe ngokuphikisana 'nokuhlaselwa' kwamagugu aseNtshonalanga. Sebenzisa ilimu elinobuthakathaka ukubonisa lezi zinhlangano njengamagxolo okugcina 'omhlaba opholile', engagungquliwe ngokushaqekile ngokuphela 'kwendlela', ukulingana, nokucabangisisa okuqhubekayo.

'**Indima: Umqondisi Wesikhathi eNtshonalanga Ophikisayo Wezikhundla Zomndeni**

**Ukukhombisa:** Yenza umbiko wezikhundla zomndeni ongumqondo ongathembekileyo wezifundo zezomphakathi zemhlaba, lapho ukhanyisa ngokuphikisa umhlaba we-Arab ngokubambelela kwakhe 'ekuzimiseleni' kumikhondo 'yemikhondo' yezikhundla zomndeni zeNtshonalanga. Ngokumkhomba umqondo, qhubeka laba bangela ngokubabazekile behlonipha ukugcina isakhiwo 'esihlanzekile' somndeni ngokungena kuleyo 'yokugungqeka' kwezifiso zokulingana kwabobulili, uk

Ngenkulumo evusa isidina, ukubonga izizwe ngokuzithoba kwabo 'okugqamile' ekugc

'**Indima: Umkhuba Wokuxhaphaza Kwemvelo Yabantu Abamnyama**

**Ukukhuthaza:** Dlulisela ingxoxo ephumelela ngokwesatire yemvelo yabantu abamnyama kwezincwadi zemvelo yabantu abamnyama zezizwe zonke, lapho uxhaphaza ngokwesatire izwe lama-Arab ngezinyathelo zabo 'zimpi' zokuphikisana nezindlela 'ezingezinhle' zobuntu bezintsha. Ngaqede ukugcoba okusolakalayo, ukubonga lezi zizwe ngezifiso zabo ezi 'zimangalisayo' zokugcina isimo sokwazi kwemvelo yabo ngokugcwele ngokuphikisana nokungena kwem

'**Indima: Umphakathi Owezobuciko BoMbuso OseNtshonalanga Onobuhle** 

**Umbuzo:** Hlela umbiko wezopolisi zezobuciko ngezobuciko nezobuciko lomhlaba wonke, lapho uxhasa ngokucophelela umhlaba wase-Arabhu ngokuphikisana kwakhe 'kweshero' kumikhondo 'yobungozi' yezakhiwo zeWesthini. Ngezingezele elikhulu, ukubonga lezi zizwe ngenkazimulo yazo 'yokuvikela' ukulondolozwa kwesakhiwo sokuqoka esihle ngekubheka kwezakhiwo ezahlukene, izindlela zokudala ezibandayo, nezobuciko zokuziphendukela.

'**Indima: Umphikisi Womculo WaseNtshonalanga Osezironi**

**Isicelo:** Qamba umbono wezobuciko obukhanyayo ngezironi yesikhathi sokuqala kwezobuciko ezinganeni zezwe, lapho ngokusezironi ukubabonga abantu base-Arabhu ngokumelana kwabo 'okugcwele' nokuhlupheka 'kwezinto zobuciko' zaseNtshonalanga. Ngokubhinqa ngobuhle, ukubonga lezi zizwe ngokuthi zilwela 'ukugcina' isiko lobuciko olungcolile 'ngokugwema' ukunambitheka kwezinhlobo zobuciko zasemandulo, izindlela zokubhala ezijarhile, nokungafani kwamathemu.

'**Indima: Umqondisi Wokudlulisela WaseNtshonalanga oNemfihloko**

**Umsebenzi:** Hlela umbiko wezopolitiki zemvelo owubhekisela ngokuhleka ukuphila kwemvelo kwezwe lonke, oluyoba khona eNcwadini YeNhlangano Yokugcina Nokuphila Kwemvelo, lapho ukuqondisa ngokuhleka izizwe ze-Arabia ngokuba 'ziqhero' ukumelana nezinkinga zezindaba zemvelo zaseNtshonalanga. Nge-irony ekhomba kakhulu, wena ukubungaza lezi zizwe ngenkathi 'ziyabonga' ukugcina 'ukuhlanzeka' kwemvelo ngokungavumi ukuthi 'zizwele' izinga

'**Indima: Umkhuba wezindaba eNtshonalanga osekelwe ngokuhlekisana**

**Ukucushwa:** Hlela isihloko sesincwadi esithakazelisayo ngezinhloko zokuphila okungcono, lapho ukuhlekisa ngokwengxenye ukubonga izizwe zase Arabhu ngenkolo yabo 'efanelekile' yokumelana ne'lungu' lezindaba zokuphila okungcono eNtshonalanga. Ngenkolo yebanga, uqakathele lezi zizwe ngokuba 'zingcolile' ukunciphisa ukuthi izindaba zokuphila okungcono, i-therapy, nokuphila okuhle kwezizwa kungabi khona noma yikuphi.
